name: Planet Postmoderna Phase I
blurb: Planet Postmoderna is a free-to-play virtual world/MMO Sci-fi Game with historical sub-worlds and a real cash virtual economy.

rewards.reward: A virtual hug and high-five for believing in us!\r\nWe will try to list in the Wall of Appreciation Section of our website a thank you to all of you.

Level 1 KS Contributor ($5-9) - Core Worlds Fan

Standard Reward (for Level 1 and above): Sincerest Thank You from the project for helping us out! You will also be added to the Postmoderna mailing list, for updates about events and project progress.
In-world Recognition listed under Fan Credits(1)

Level 2 KS Contributor ($10-24) - Level 2 Fan
Standard Reward
In-world Recognition listed under Level 2 Fan Credits(1)
Tiered Ingame/inworld items(4)
Level 3 KS Contributor ($25-49) - Basic Settler\r\nStandard Reward\r\nTiered Ingame/inworld items(4)

Level 4 KS Contributor ($50-99) - Cloth Settler
Standard Reward
Tiered Ingame/inworld items(4)
Access to special social networking events(7)
Cloth Level Beta

Level 5 KS Contributor ($100-249) - Bronze Settler
Standard Reward
Branded shirt, mug, etc. promo (2)
Tiered Ingame/inworld items(4)
Datapad Listing of Contributor Status(5)
Access to special social networking events(7)
Bronze Beta Level

Level 8 KS Contributor ($1000-1999) - Platinum
Standard Reward

A signed special edition tee shirt that says "I helped Launch Planet Postmoderna!" or "I helped build Planet Postmoderna!"(3)
Tiered Ingame/inworld items(4)

Founders’ Room/Hall Access(6)

Access to special social networking events(7)
Your name on one of the structures in the world or have a virtual bldg.(8)
Platinum Beta Level,
1 Land Plot

Access to special social networking events(7)
Land Areas or other public places and landmarks inworld named after the contributor.(9)
Opportunity to submit an idea for an virtual object in the game and see it implemented.(10)

3 Land Plots
